TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IKeyboardInputSite

summary.span: Manages keyboard focus within the container.

span.span: Manages keyboard focus within the container.

summary.span: This interface implements keyboard message management in WPF-Win32 interoperation scenarios.

span.span: This interface implements keyboard message management in WPF-Win32 interoperation scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks コンテナーはに含まれるコンポーネントの各固有のこのインターフェイスのインスタンスを提供する必要があります。A container should provide a unique instance of this interface for each of its contained components. インターフェイスおよび一緒に使用すると、相互運用の境界を越えてキーボード操作のサポートを提供します。The interface and the are used together to provide support for keyboard actions across interoperation boundaries. サイト (実装)、シンクの親を表す ()。A site ( implementation) represents a parent of a sink (). シンク () キーボードの動作の大半を実装します。The sink () implements the majority of keyboard behavior. サイト固有のシンクのプロパティによって返されるので、各サイトは、シンクを提供もする必要があります、インターフェイスです。Each site must also provide a sink, because the site-specific sink is returned by a property of the interface. については、入力のアーキテクチャを具体的には実装されている[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]相互運用を参照してください[Windows フォームと WPF の相互運用性入力アーキテクチャ](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-interoperability-input-architecture.md)です。For a discussion of the input architecture specifically implemented for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] interoperation, see [Windows Forms and WPF Interoperability Input Architecture](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-interoperability-input-architecture.md). 詳細については[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]相互運用シナリオを参照して[WPF および Win32 の相互運用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md)です。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] interoperation scenarios, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnNoMoreTabStops(class System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest request) cil managed
Public Function OnNoMoreTabStops (request As TraversalRequest) As Boolean

param.name: request
param.span: Specifies whether focus should be set to the first or the last tab stop.

span.span: Specifies whether focus should be set to the first or the last tab stop.

summary.span: Called by a contained component when it has reached its last tab stop and has no further items to tab to.

span.span: Called by a contained component when it has reached its last tab stop and has no further items to tab to.

returns.span: If this method returns , the site has shifted focus to another component.

span.span: If this method returns , the site has shifted focus to another component.

returns.span: If this method returns , focus is still within the calling component.

span.span: If this method returns , focus is still within the calling component.

returns.span: The component should "wrap around" and set focus to its first contained tab stop.

span.span: The component should "wrap around" and set focus to its first contained tab stop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks コンポーネントの呼び出しコンポーネントは、要求したフォーカスの移動を試行ものの、これ以上のタブがないときは、その独自のコンポーネント内でその方向に停止します。Components call when the component attempts a requested focus move but there are no further tab stops in that direction within that own component.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Sink As IKeyboardInputSink

summary.span: Gets the keyboard sink associated with this site.

span.span: Gets the keyboard sink associated with this site.

value.span: 現在のサイトのインターフェイスです。

remarks.format: ## Remarks このプロパティは、親を返さないインターフェイスです。This property does not return the parent interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Unregister() cil managed

summary.span: Unregisters a child keyboard input sink from this site.

span.span: Unregisters a child keyboard input sink from this site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このプロパティは、コンテナーのサイトには影響しません。This property does not affect the site on the container.
